execution_plan.description: Compute the count of products and the sum of their prices from the primary products table (store_main).
execution_plan.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS product_count, SUM(price) AS total_price FROM products;

execution_plan.description: Compute the count of items and the sum of their prices (in cents) from the alternative items table (store_alt).
execution_plan.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS item_count, SUM(amount_in_cents) AS total_cents FROM items;
